page.title: 09Ulpha C.E School
page.content: Our shool is in Ulpha and some children come five miles to school. It had a new extension built in 1967 and we have lovely views.I measured the playground and the width 13 metres.We have three big rooms all about six metres square.It is safe to play outside because the school is 100 metres from the road.Everyone stays for dinner.The dinner comes from Black Combe School Millom and Mr Fletcher brings it in containers Mrs Trenouth helps.Today we had mince and dumplings and jacket potatoes or hot dogs and a bun,yoghurt or ice cream.
